Disease.Name: HYPOTHYROIDISM, CONGENITAL, NONGOITROUS, 1; CHNG1
Disease.Summary: rare;autosomal recessive;mutation in the thyroid-stimulating hormone receptor gene;Affected individuals have elevated serum TSH in the absence of goiter, with the severity ranging from nongoitrous isolated hyperthyrotropinemia to severe congenital hypothyroidism with thyroid hypoplasia [Grasberger H, 2017]

symtomp.symptom: no clinical symptoms (probably) / no clinical significance

literature.title: Mutation screening of the TSHR gene in 220 Chinese patients with congenital hypothyroidism
literature.author: Fang Y,

literature.title: Resistance to thyrotropin
literature.author: Grasberger H,
literature.journal: Best Pract Res Clin Endocrinol Metab
